meanings: (공동묘지) cemetery, burial ground; (교회 근처의) graveyard, churchyard
pay one's respects at the National Cemetery

vlive.korean: [잘생기고 노래까지 잘부르는 댛냥이 천하제일미묘지] - 되게 잘 어울려요 형. - 그렇죠? [Daehyun who's handsome and sings well] - It looks good on you. - Right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [B.A.P] 이 세상 치명 다 씹어먹은 밥돌이들과 🎃해삐할로윈🎃(Happy Halloween with B.A.P)
vlive.english: [Daehyun who's handsome and sings well] - It looks good on you. - Right?

vlive.korean: 묘지 이장? - 묘지 이장. Exhumation? - Yes, exhumation! 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep59_던전앤파이터 때문에 000까지 해봤다?!
그 뒤에는 다 묘지 단지에요. Behind that was a cemetery. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [S.M. THE ARTIST] Super Voice of YESUNG #03
공동묘지. - 아니고요. - 맛동산! - 뭐야? Cemetery. - No - Matdongsan! - What? 듣기 View video MAP6 : 맵식스의 캐치마인드~❤️
괜찮아요. -공동묘지에서 썰매 타고 그랬거든요. It's okay. - I rode sleds there. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [REPLAY]Christmas Week EP.2 STARSHIP-ENT (스타쉽엔터)
vlive.english: It's okay. - I rode sleds there.

examples.korean: She now lies at rest in the churchyard. 발음듣기 그 분은 이제 영면에 들어 교회 묘지에 누워 계신다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She now lies at rest in the churchyard. 발음

examples.korean: She rests beside her husband in the local cemetery. 발음듣기 그녀는 지역 묘지에 그녀의 남편 옆에 잠들어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She rests beside her husband in the local cemetery. 발음

examples.korean: He was buried in Highgate Cemetery. 발음듣기 그는 하이게이트 묘지에 묻혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was buried in Highgate Cemetery. 발음

examples.korean: the desecration of a cemetery 발음듣기 묘지 훼손 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the desecration of a cemetery 발음

examples.korean: I cremated my dog because I have coimetrophobia. 발음듣기 나는 묘지 공포증이 있어서 개를 화장했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I cremated my dog because I have coimetrophobia. 발음
